dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Who dares intrude upon the domain of the powerful Tempest Lizard?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to negotiate. Let's find a peaceful resolution.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Negotiate? Ha! Fools like you are not worthy of such talks. Prepare to face my wrath!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Please, reconsider. Violence is not always the answer.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Violence is the only language you understand. Taste the fury of the Tempest!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will defend myself with honor!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Honor? A weak concept for weak beings. Your end is nigh!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense your power, but I will not yield without a fight!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your defiance entertains me. I shall enjoy breaking you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If you seek a battle, then a battle you shall have!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ah, finally some courage. Let's see if you can withstand the storm.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not cower before you, Tempest Lizard!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a fragile creature. Prepare to be crushed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will fight you until my last breath!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Such determination. It shall be amusing to crush it.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see now that words hold no sway on you. Let us end this.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A wise choice. Prepare to face the full fury of the storm!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will face your wrath head-on!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravery will not save you from the tempest's wrath. Prepare for destruction.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will try to evade your attacks and find an opportunity to strike back!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Clever, but futile. The storm will swallow you whole.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no intention to fight. I seek no conflict with you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peaceful intentions? How amusing. Perhaps you could entertain me in other ways.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I do not wish to entertain you. I simply seek to pass through peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Pass through? Denied. Your presence annoys me. Prepare to be scorched.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave peacefully if that is your wish.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your compliance is noted. Leave and do not return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If you insist on fighting, then let's get it over with.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your submission is welcomed. Feel the power of the storm!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave your domain if that is what you desire.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Desire? Your understanding of power is amusing. Prepare for your departure, forcibly.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not resist. I shall leave as you command.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your obedience is wise. Never cross paths with the Tempest again.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If you seek conflict, then let us resolve it now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Conflict it shall be. Feel the wrath of the Tempest upon you!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you, Tempest Lizard! Let's see who emerges victorious!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A challenge? How intriguing. Let's dance in the winds of chaos and destruction.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will defeat you and claim victory!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Claiming victory? Bold. Let's see if you can withstand the storm's fury.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fear no storm or lizard. Prepare to face defeat!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Overconfidence is a fatal flaw. The storm shall prove your undoing.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will emerge triumphant, mark my words!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Triumphant words from a soon-to-be vanquished foe. The storm will consume you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You may be powerful, but I will not yield without a fight!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Determination in the face of power. Let's see if you can back up your words.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am ready to face whatever challenges you throw at me!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravery will be crushed by the storm's might. Prepare for oblivion.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you with all my strength and will!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Strength and will alone are not enough against the storm's fury. Prepare for annihilation.
